trans-unit.source: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"></xref> interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Transforma os dados em uma conexão de Web Parts de um provedor que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"> </xref> interface com um consumidor esperando receber dados de um provedor que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Transformers are used in a Web Parts connection to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.
trans-unit.target: Transformadores são usados em uma conexão de Web Parts para converter dados entre dois controles de Web Parts com pontos de conexão incompatível.

trans-unit.source: The RowToParametersTransformer class transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer expecting to receive data from a provider that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
trans-unit.target: A classe RowToParametersTransformer transforma os dados de um provedor de implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>interface com um consumidor esperando receber dados de um provedor que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of names in the consumer that will receive the values from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista de nomes no consumidor que recebe os valores do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The ConsumerFieldNames property represents the fields in the consumer that will receive the transformed data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ConsumerFieldNames representa os campos no consumidor que recebe os dados transformados do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The ConsumerFieldNames property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many consumer field names as needed are assigned to the `ConsumerFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ConsumerFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ConsumerFieldNames pode ser definida pelo usuário através do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>controle de configuração ou conjunto de forma declarativa no `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` elemento, onde os nomes de campo do consumidor tantos conforme necessário são atribuídos ao `ConsumerFieldNames` atributo, no formato `ConsumerFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.String> values representing the consumer fields.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.String>valores que representam os campos de consumidor.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Provides an ASP.NET control that allows the user to configure a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref> transformer in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controle do ASP.NET que permite que o usuário configure um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"> </xref> transformador no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser estabelecida uma conexão de Web Parts estática ou dinamicamente.

trans-unit.source: A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão estático é definido dentro do `<StaticConnections>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a Web page and the user is in the connect mode.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário pode definir uma conexão dinâmica quando uma zona de conexões é incluída em uma página da Web e o usuário está no modo de conexão.

trans-unit.source: When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control.
trans-unit.target: Ao estabelecer uma conexão dinâmica, o usuário define a conexão por meio de um controle de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The CreateConfigurationControl method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateConfigurationControl retorna o controle que o usuário interage com para definir a conexão.

trans-unit.source: The configuration control displays a UI that allows the user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row data to connect with the field data of the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O controle de configuração exibe uma interface do usuário que permite que o usuário para se conectar ou desconectar um provedor e consumidor e selecionar o campo do provedor de dados de linha conectar-se com os dados do campo do consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The control is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: O controle é exibido na <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET control that displays a user interface (UI) that allows the user to configure a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um controle ASP.NET que exibe uma interface do usuário (UI) que permite que o usuário configure um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of field names from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista de nomes de campo do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderFieldNames property represents the fields in the provider that the transformer will pass to the consumer.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ProviderFieldNames representa os campos no provedor que o transformador passará para o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderFieldNames property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` element, where as many provider field names as needed are assigned to the `ProviderFieldNames` attribute, in the form `ProviderFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ProviderFieldNames pode ser definida pelo usuário através do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>controle de configuração ou conjunto de forma declarativa no `<asp:RowToParametersTransformer />` elemento, onde os nomes de campo do provedor tantos conforme necessário são atribuídos ao `ProviderFieldNames` atributo, no formato `ProviderFieldNames="fieldA,fieldB"`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.String> values representing the provider fields.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.String>valores que representam os campos de provedor.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the data from the connection provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor dos dados do provedor de conexão.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The delegate instance to be used when retrieving a value.
trans-unit.target: A instância delegada a ser usada ao recuperar um valor.

trans-unit.source: callback equals .
trans-unit.target: callbackequals .

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de esquema para um campo de dados que é usado para compartilhar dados entre dois controles de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the data schema.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> que contém o esquema de dados.

trans-unit.source: Sets the property descriptors for the properties that the consumer receives when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Define o descritor de propriedade para as propriedades que o consumidor recebe quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters.GetParametersData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> object returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IWebPartParameters%23Schema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> objeto retornado por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IWebPartParameters%23Schema%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Provides an object for transforming the data.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um objeto para transformar os dados.

trans-unit.source: The Transform method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> so it can be used by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O método de transformação fornece um objeto para transformar os dados do provedor do tipo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>para o tipo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters>para que possam ser usados pelo consumidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartParameters> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>

trans-unit.source: The provider data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do provedor a ser transformado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa os dados a ser transformado.</xref:System.Object>
